mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, TITLE, GROUPID, CREATETIME, CREATEOPER, STATUS, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, RECORDENUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, SENDTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RETURNID from DB_SENDMESSAGE where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, TITLE, GROUPID, CREATETIME, CREATEOPER, STATUS, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, RECORDENUM, SUCCESSNUM, ERRORNUM, SENDTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RETURNID from DB_SENDMESSAGE

returnid = #{returnid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
1=1
